title: LocalBusiness JSON-LD Schema
description:
Implement LocalBusiness JSON-LD Structured Data for Enhanced Local SEO

Add comprehensive JSON-LD structured data markup to the website using schema.org's LocalBusiness vocabulary to improve visibility in Google local search results and rich snippets.

Requirements:
- Implement JSON-LD script tag with @type "LocalBusiness" or appropriate subtype (e.g., "ProfessionalService", "Store", etc.)
- Include all core business identity properties:
  - Business name (legal and DBA if applicable)
  - Complete postal address for west Houston location
  - Primary phone number and alternative contact methods if available
  - Business URL and social media profiles
- Define service area coverage:
  - Primary service area: ZIP code 77077
  - Extended service areas: surrounding ZIP codes in west Houston
  - Use "areaServed" property with GeoCircle or list of postal codes
- Specify detailed opening hours:
  - Weekly schedule with dayOfWeek and hours
  - Handle special cases (holidays, seasonal hours)
  - Mark closed days explicitly
- Add supporting properties for SEO value:
  - Business description
  - Price range indicator if applicable
  - Accepted payment methods
  - Business logo and image URLs
  - Aggregate rating if reviews exist
- Validate implementation:
  - Test with Google Rich Results Test tool
  - Verify no errors in Google Search Console
  - Ensure JSON-LD is properly embedded in HTML head or body
- Consider additional enhancements:
  - GeoCoordinates for precise location
  - Same-day service availability if offered
  - Special COVID-19 announcements if relevant

Edge Cases:
- Handle businesses with multiple locations appropriately
- Account for temporary hour changes or closures
- Ensure address format matches Google My Business listing exactly
